TABLE.NAME: moodle_instances
TABLE.COMMENT: Moodle instances that this Moodle instance knows about.

FIELD.NAME: wwwroot
FIELD.COMMENT: A URL. The wwwroot as configured in the instance.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance to be used for such things as directory names. Use wwwroot starting from the domain name and replace any forward slashes with underscores.

FIELD.NAME: isupgradeserver
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether the instance can be used to convert courses from Moodle version 1.9 to 2.0.
